Google( NASDAQ: GOOG) said Eric Schmidt will continue to act as an internal advisor to Page and Sergey Brin , but will devote his attention to other areas, including deals, partnerships and government relations. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement.
